item.title: Talking to whole world about Pahalgam attack, Operation Sindoor, but why no talk in Parliament?
item.description:
<![CDATA[In a strongly worded message posted on social media platform X, Lok Sabha member from Raichur G. Kumar Naik has criticised the ongoing silence of the Indian Parliament on the recent terror attack in Pahalgam and the subsequent military response, Operation Sindoor. He called for immediate convening of Parliament to discuss the matter and stressed that national security deserves a debate within the highest democratic institution — not just statements from global stages.
“For the past week, the na...]]>
